name: UFC Soup Trivia Quiz | Sports Other | 10 Questions

questions.text: Which fighter won "Fight Of The Year" honors in 2005?
questions.explanation:
Forrest Griffin.

	Forrest Griffin won "Fight Of The Year" for his fight with Stephan Bonnar. It was the fight that put UFC on the map.

questions.text: Which fighter won back-to-back UFC tournaments in 1996?
questions.explanation:
Mark Coleman.

	Mark Coleman won UFC 10 and 11 in 1996. He also fought rival Mauricio Rua in UFC 93.

questions.text: Who was the first fighter in MMA history to knock out Chuck Liddell twice?
questions.explanation:
Quinton Jackson.

	Rampage knocked Chuck Liddell out once in Pride FC, and once in UFC 71.

questions.text: Which of these fighters lost five fights in a row by either TKO or KO?
questions.explanation:
Ken Shamrock.

	Ken Shamrock lost all five of his fights after winning UFC 48 in 2004.

questions.text: Which fighter moved to the 185 pounds class after he lost at UFC 78?
questions.explanation:
Michael Bisping.

	UFC 78 was Michael's first loss, and he felt like his more natural weight was 185. He started off by going 3-0 in that class.

questions.text: Which fighter entered the UFC as a heavyweight, but was too small, and went down to 205lbs?
questions.explanation:
Rashad Evans.

	He won the Ultimate Fighter 2 as a heavyweight, but then dropped to 205 after the finale. He later faced Forrest Griffin at UFC 92 for the 205 pound belt.

questions.text: This fighter is a former 205-pound champion.  He won the belt at UFC 25 by beating Wanderlei Silva.  He defended his title five times.  Who is this fighter?
questions.explanation:
Tito Ortiz.

	Tito Ortiz beat Wanderlei Silva by unanimous decision at UFC 25 to get the crown.

questions.text: Rich Franklin won the UFC Middlewieght Championship from which fighter?
questions.explanation:
Evan Tanner.

	He also fought Evan Tanner in his UFC debut at UFC 42 Sudden Impact.

questions.text: This fighter held notable victories over Igor Vovchanchyn, Yuki Kondo, Kevin Randleman, and Murilo Bustamante.  Who is this Japanese fighter?
questions.explanation:
Kazuhiro Nakamura.

	Kazuhiro Nakmura's last UFC fight was at UFC 84 against Sokoudjou.

questions.text: What college did Chuck Liddell go to?
questions.explanation:
California Polytechnic State University.

	Chuck Liddell attended California Polytechnic State University and graduated in 1995 with a Bachelor's degree in business/accounting.
